DOC.brief_title: Acceptance Commitment Therapy Patients With Multi-organ Bodily Distress Syndrome ( Stress-4 )
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study test effect Acceptance Commitment Therapy ( ACT ) patient multi-organ Bodily distress syndrome ( BDS ) . BDS unifying diagnosis encompasses group closely related condition somatization disorder , fibromyalgia , irritable bowel syndrome chronic fatigue syndrome . The project consist three-armed randomized control trial ACT treatment give supplement standard treatment either 9-session group therapy 1-day workshop follow individual consultation , compare standard treatment , one single advisory consultation . Primary outcome patient-rated improvement measure Clinical Global Improvement Scale ( CGI-I ) . Secondary outcome functional level ( physical , mental social ) measure SF-36 Physical Component Summary ( PCS ) . The study include 180 participant .
